definition[0]: a system of lines, tubes, wires, roads etc that cross each other and are connected to each other
example[3]: the network of blood vessels in the body
definition[1]: a group of radio or television stations, which broadcast many of the same programmes, but in different parts of the same country
example[5]: You’re listening to the American Armed Forces Network.
definition[2]: a set of computers that are connected to each other so that they can share information
definition[3]: a group of people, organizations etc that are connected or that work together
example[6]: It’s important to build up a network of professional contacts.
definition[4]: to connect several computers together so that they can share information
definition[5]: to meet and talk with people who have similar jobs to yours, especially because they may be useful for your work
definition[6]: to broadcast a radio or television programme on several different channels at the same time
definition[7]: a group of people or organizations that are connected or that work together
example[7]: The gadget is available from the manufacturer and its network of stockists.
definition[8]: a set of computers which are connected to each other and operate as part of the same system, able to exchange information and messages
example[9]: The vendor automatically orders new deliveries from the retailer through its computer network.
definition[9]: a group of radio or television stations that broadcast many of the same programmes, but at different times in different places
definition[10]: the system of roads, railways, or communication systems such as telephones used in a country
definition[11]: to make use of meetings with people involved in the same kind of work, in order to share information, help each other etc
example[13]: He spent a couple of evenings a month networking at business functions.
definition[12]: to connect several computers together so that they operate as part of the same system, able to exchange information and messages
example[14]: This software will allow us to network our computers.
